question: Question_06_(c)
statement:
Consider the homogeneous system $\displaystyle A\vec{x} = 0$. Suppose
that the Echelon form of \emph{A} is given by

$\displaystyle A_{1} = \begin{bmatrix}
1 & 0 & -1 & 2 \\
0 & 0 & 0 & 0\\
0 & 0 & 0 & 0
\end{bmatrix}$

Construct an orthonormal basis for the solution space of the system
$A\vec{x} = 0$
